page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: {TOURISM }THIS WILL DEVELOP IN THE FUTURE UNTIL NOW THERE HAS BEEN NO OVERNIGHT ACCOMMODATION. {HOSTEL }THIS CAN ACCOMMODATE 10 PERSONS,OUT WITH THE STALKING SEASON. {CAMPING }THIS IS ALLOWED IN THE AREA. {HOTEL }THERE ARE PLANS TO OPEN A HOTEL IN THE NEAR FUTURE. {PUB }THIS IS A NEW DEVELOPEMENT WHICH WILL PROVIDE TOURISTS WITH MEALS. TOURISTS COME TO THE AREA TO HILL WALK,CLIMB,ADMIRE THE SCENERY,WILDLIFE AND WILD FLOWERS AND TO ENJOY THE PEACE AND TRANQUILITY. THE BAY PROVIDES A SAFE ANCHORAGE FOR ALL TYPE OF BOAT. TOURISM IS RESTRICTED BECAUSE OF THE DIFFICULTY OF ACCESS. SHOOTING AND FISHING IS LET PER WEEK TO PARTIES OF PEOPLE WHO COME FROM THE CONTINENT&N.AMERICA TO AVAIL THEMSELVES OF THE EXCELLENT SPORT.
